author: From businessinsider.in
title: The governor of the Bank of Italy is being investigated
text: From businessinsider.in The investigation is related to one Italian bank's purchase of another lender during 2014, Banco Desio's acquisition of Banco Populare diSpoleto,according to Corriere Della Sera, one of Italy's most popular Newspapers. Here's a Google translation of the piece. The position held by Visco is one of the European Central Bank's most influential, as Italy is the eurozone's third-largest economy. Before it was held by him, ECB President Mario Draghi headed the BoI. The news was originally reported byIl Fatto Quotidiano, an Italian newspaper. Here's the front page of Tuesday's edition:
